A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Literally the worst movie I have ever seen- the title should have been \"Star Wars- The Last Way to Kill a Series\"  I am so hurt right now. I go to maybe 3 movies a year...always on Christmas Eve. I've never understood how someone would want to review a movie- but after watching this burning trsah can.  I completely understand. I should have sen Thor like I wanted to\, but I let the hype for this movie sway me. I would love to sit down and watch this movie as painful as it would be and ask them throughout the movie wtf made them think any of what happened in this movie seemed okay or was worthy of this series. Everything is just wrong.
